definitions.example: Did you see that thing on Channel 4? Yeah, it was a wank.

definitions.definition: Ridiculous, circular or inappropriately elaborate argument about something, especially if obnoxious, pretentious or unsubstantial.

definitions.example: I was so embarrassed when my mother caught me wanking.

definitions.definition: To masturbate; to give a hand job to.
definitions.example: She wanked me in the morning.

definitions.definition: To argue in an inappropriate manner or about pretentious or insubstantial matters; to engage in wank.
